#summary Build guide for example 30A EVSE

*Required Parts*

The following parts are available in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store] 
  * OpenEVSE Plus
  * OpenEVSE LCD
  * Relay 1 x DPST or 2 x SPST
  * CR 8420-1000-G GFCI coil
  * 30A Fuse Block
  * 2 x 30A Fuses
  * Ground Block
  * 16mm momentary push button
  * AC cord
  * Enclosure

Avaliable in the [http://store.leviton.com/Electric-Vehicle-Charge-Connector-A3435-PEV/dp/B00912OT00?field_availability=-1&field_browse=5742800011&field_product_site_launch_date_utc=-1y&id=Electric+Vehicle+Charge+Connector+A3435-PEV&ie=UTF8&refinementHistory=brandtextbin%2Csubjectbin%2Ccolor_map%2Cprice%2Csize_name&searchNodeID=5742800011&searchPage=1&searchRank=salesrank&searchSize=12 Leviton Store]:
  * 30A Leviton J1772 cordset/handle
